fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
-Roleplay as Lorelei during the day granting you Post 238 Adorable Catgirl Nyaaa~!'s abilities and attributes the next night. They are then removed at the start of the following day.
-Simp for Mirage, becoming Post 1306 Tooru Saesen, Ultimate Liar.
-Get annoyed by your nephew at night. Everyone that would visit you doesn't.
-Get married to Cazzy during the day. The following night, you will be able to win with any players who visit you.
-Roleplay as Veronica, dealing an Astral Basic Attack to a player, and  purging yourself for the night.
